name: Kitty Jam: A Kitty Courier Adventure
name_original: Kitty Jam: A Kitty Courier Adventure
description:
Play as a tiny kitty and help your wizard grandpa with his jams!

Key features:

  • Deliver ingredients!
  • Ride a boat!
  • Let a stranger touch you!
  • The strand-based gameplay!
  • Explore a seamless open world!
  • Hints at a riveting combat!
  • Complete and utter lack of sound!

This game was made for Sylvie's Jam #1. If you struggle with the game's complex design and metaphors, please, read the jam's theme, it will all make much more sense.
